refnamediv.refpurpose: Lists the shader name and parameters, RGB color, RGB_valid flag, and the inheritance flag to the specified file for the listed objects.

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: Lists the shader name and parameters, RGB color, RGB_valid flag, and the inheritance flag to the specified file for the listedobjects. The format used is compatible with the rmater command. If file already exists, the new data is appended to it.

refsection.title: EXAMPLES
refsection.para: The example shows the use of the wmater command to list the shader parameters of two objects to a specified file.

example.title: List the shader parameters of two objects to a specified file.
example.para: Lists the shader parameters of group1 and regiona to mater_file.
